聖書考古学: (せいしょこうこがく) - Biblical archaeology
聖書解釈学: (せいしょかいしゃくがく) - exegetics
聖杯: (せいはい) - chalice (for Holy Communion); Holy Chalice/Holy Grail
聖柄: (ひじりづか) - sword hilt shaped similar to the handle of a vajra; plain, wooden sword hilt (as opposed to those wrapped in sharkskin)
聖楽: (せいがく) - church music; sacred music
聖槍: (せいそう) - holy lance; sacred spear
聖樹: (せいじゅ) - holy tree/sacred tree; Christmas tree
聖櫃: (せいひつ) - Ark of the Covenant (Judaism); tabernacle (Catholicism)
聖母: (せいぼ) - holy mother/birth mother of a holy man (or woman); Virgin Mary
聖母被昇天: (せいぼひしょうてん) - Assumption (of the body and soul of Mary into heaven)
聖水: (せいすい) - holy water; urine, especially as relates to urolagnia or urophilia
聖水盤: (せいすいばん) - stoup; piscina; aspersorium
聖火リレー: (せいかリレー) - Olympic torch relay
聖火台: (せいかだい) - platform (structure) bearing the Olympic flame
聖盃: (せいはい) - chalice (for Holy Communion); Holy Chalice/Holy Grail
聖目: (せいもく) - the nine principal points in a game of go
聖神中央教会: (せいしんちゅうおうきょうかい) - The Central Church of Holy God
聖祭: (せいさい) - Catholic rite (e.g. mass); hierurgy
聖職: (せいしょく) - sacred profession; holy orders; vocation; ministry
聖職者: (せいしょくしゃ) - clergyman; churchman; clergy
聖観世音: (しょうかんぜのん) - Aryavalokitesvara (manifestation of Avalokitesvara)
聖観音: (しょうかんのん) - Aryavalokitesvara (manifestation of Avalokitesvara)
聖誕祭: (せいたんさい) - Christmas; holy birthday
聖路加病院: (せいろかびょういん) - St Luke Hospital
聖霊: (せいれい) - the Holy Ghost; the Holy Spirit
聖霊会: (しょうりょうえ) - (esp. 精霊会)  Bon Festival; (esp. 聖霊会) Buddhist service for the anniversary of the death of Shotoku Taishi (orig. the 22nd day of the 2nd month of the lunar calendar)
聖霊運動: (せいれいうんどう) - Pentecostal movement
聖霊降臨祭: (せいれいこうりんさい) - (the feast of) Pentecost
聖餐: (せいざん) - Holy Communion; Lord's Supper; Eucharist
聖餐式: (せいさんしき) - Holy Communion; the Eucharist; the Lord's Supper
聖骸布: (せいがいふ) - holy shroud (i.e. the Shroud of Turin)
聚斂: (しゅうれん) - (levying of a) heavy taxation
聚楽: (じゅらく) - grey wall covering material (gray)
聚落: (じゅらく) - village; community; settlement; town; colony (animals, etc.)
聞いてあきれる: (きいてあきれる) - to be astonished to hear; to be incredulous about; to express disbelief
聞いてみると: (きいてみると) - on inquiry; if inquiring
聞いて呆れる: (きいてあきれる) - to be astonished to hear; to be incredulous about; to express disbelief
聞いて極楽見て地獄: (きいてごくらくみてじごく) - A paradise on hearsay, a hell at sight
聞えよがし: (きこえよがし) - bad-mouthing someone so as to be deliberately overheard; intentionally letting someone hear insults or sarcasm regarding them
聞える: (きこえる) - to be heard/to be audible; to be said to be/to be reputed
聞かす: (きかす) - to inform about; to read to; to sing for
聞かせどころ: (きかせどころ) - most moving part; compelling part (of story); climax
聞かせる: (きかせる) - to read to/to sing for/to inform/to tell; to persuade/to make understand
聞かせ所: (きかせどころ) - most moving part; compelling part (of story); climax
聞かん坊: (きかんぼう) - naughty child; unruly child
聞か猿: (きかざる) - hear-not monkey (one of the three wise monkeys)
聞き: (kiki) - hearing, audible sound; rumour, rumor, hearsay, reputation , hearing, audible sound; rumour, rumor, hearsay, reputation; tasting (álcool, chá, etc.)
聞きあきる: (ききあきる) - to be tired of hearing
聞きいる: (ききいる) - to listen attentively to; to be lost in
聞きおぼえ: (ききおぼえ) - learning by ear; memory of having heard something before
聞きおぼえがある: (ききおぼえがある) - to have heard somewhere; to sound familiar
聞きおぼえる: (ききおぼえる) - to be familiar; to learn by ear/to pick up knowledge
聞きかじる: (ききかじる) - to have a smattering knowledge of
聞きしにまさる: (ききしにまさる) - to a greater extent than one has heard; going beyond one's expectations
聞きしに勝る: (ききしにまさる) - to a greater extent than one has heard; going beyond one's expectations
聞きたがる: (ききたがる) - to be curious; to be inquisitive; to want to hear
聞きただす: (ききただす) - to find out the truth; to ascertain; to clarify; to confirm; to verify
聞きつける: (ききつける) - to hear/to catch (the sound of something); to hear about (rumour, etc.)/to overhear/to learn of (something); to get used to hearing
聞きとる: (ききとる) - to catch (a person's words); to make out; to follow; to understand
聞きなおす: (ききなおす) - to listen again; to ask again
聞きにくい: (ききにくい) - difficult to hear; hesitating to ask
聞きほれる: (ききほれる) - to listen to in an ecstasy
聞きもしないで: (ききもしないで) - without even asking; without even listening; without careful inquiry (enquiry)
聞きもらす: (ききもらす) - to fail to hear; to miss
聞き付ける: (ききつける) - to hear/to catch (the sound of something); to hear about (rumour, etc.)/to overhear/to learn of (something); to get used to hearing
聞き入る: (ききいる) - to listen attentively to; to be lost in
聞き入れる: (ききいれる) - to grant (a wish); to accede; to comply with; to heed
聞き出す: (ききだす) - to get information out of a person; to begin listening
